P5707 【深基2.例12】上学迟到

Written on December 26th, 2024 by ZJM 
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int s,v,t,h,m;
    cin>>s>>v;
    if(s%v==0)
        t=10+s/v;
    else
        t=11+s/v;
    h=t/60,m=t%60;
    if(m==0)
    {
        if(h<=8)
        {
            h=8-h;
            cout<<0<<h<<":00";
        }
        else
        {
            h=32-h;
            if(h<10)
                cout<<0<<h<<":00";
            else
                cout<<h<<":00";
        }
    }
    else
    {
        m=60-m;
        h++;
        if(h<=8)
        {
            h=8-h;
            cout<<0<<h<<":";
        }
        else
        {
            h=32-h;
            if(h<10)
                cout<<0<<h<<":";
            else
                cout<<h<<":";
        }
        if(m<10)
            cout<<0<<m;
        else
            cout<<m;
    }
    return 0;
}
Feel free to share!
